MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G21 area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:54pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Edgefauld Road substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:55pm on Sunday, 21 February 2021
